channel.title: Daily News Feed Update #1
channel.description: Daily collected titles from multiple sources

item.title: English Editorials (Update #1) • Security begins to reshape Asia Pacific economic cooperation • Blue Economy still an elusive concept

International (Update #1) • US struck another boat illegally carrying drugs off Venezuela coast, Trump says • Indonesia school collapse death toll reaches 49 as search for missing students continues • Mount Everest rescue under way after snowstorm traps nearly 1,000 people • China threatened to retaliate against UK over foreign influence rules • Australian Gaza flotilla activists detained by Israel complain of ‘degrading and humiliating’ treatment • News live: Australia and PNG sign defence treaty; Allan says Melbourne’s Metro line to open this year • Man arrested after about 50 shots fired from Sydney flat injure bystanders and hit buildings and cars • Over half of Australians support sanctions on Israel and its leaders for ongoing attacks on Gaza, poll shows • Greens and Australian Christian Lobby form ‘unholy alliance’ to shut down late-night pokies in NSW • Andrej Babiš to hold talks with other Czech parties on forming government • Georgia’s prime minister announces crackdown on dissent after Tbilisi protests • Zelenskyy accuses west of ‘zero real reaction’ to Russia’s bombardment • René Magritte’s ‘superstar of surrealism’ to go on sale in Paris • Gisèle Pelicot to attend appeals court as man convicted of raping her contests verdict • Louis CK defends decision to perform at Riyadh comedy festival as ‘a good opportunity’ • Israel continues Gaza bombardment as Trump plan negotiators arrive in Cairo • Syria holds first elections since fall of Bashar al-Assad • Weary Israelis greet Trump as saviour as hostages deal inches closer • Marco Rubio says Gaza war not yet over as Israel and Hamas prepare for talks • One in four UK people fear a loved one drinks too much, survey finds • Gary Neville says he took down union flag being ‘used in a negative fashion’ • UK ministers aim to speed up homebuying by four weeks • Suspected arson attack at East Sussex mosque investigated as hate crime • Civil liberty groups express concern over plan for more anti-protest powers • House speaker says Democrats aren’t serious about shutdown negotiation as Democratic leader blames Republicans • Bad Bunny pushes back on Kristi Noem threat that immigrants stay away from Super Bowl • Kristi Noem calls Chicago a ‘war zone’ after federal agents shoot woman • ‘The president is unhinged’: Trump’s online behavior grows increasingly odd • Ohio’s sole national forest could be wiped out as Trump targets land for logging
